review_data.title: Pleasant lunch!
review_data.content: Expensive, yes (but what is not in Zurich!), but very lovely place serving good food (and pretty quickly, which is important when it comes to lunch). Burgers at about CHF30 - recommended. Great for lunch! Although beware - this place is tiny!

review_data.title: Best Hamburger
review_data.content: After a week of German food all I wanted was a great sandwich at a reasonable price on banhaustrasse. We stumbled upon Griederbar and I ordered a hamburger. Yes, i went to Zurich and ordered a hamburger.... But it was seriously one of the top...More

review_data.title: Fantastic terrace in the green!
review_data.content: To come to Grieder Terrace you have to enter Grieder shop from Bahnhofstraße and take the elevator or the stairs. It is a great place to have coffee or drinks on their beautiful terrace. They have also good lunch deals.

review_data.title: Lack of Sevice
review_data.content: We took an empty table and they said it was booked. We had to move out and order our drinks standing up in the terrace and after half an hour that we finished them..No one came to the table. Good way of making business.

review_data.title: Disapointing
review_data.content: I have heard about the Griederbar a couple of times: Nice venue, unexpectedly beautiful in the center of Zurich on the top floor of the famous luxury brand house Grieder. Finally I had a chance to go there for lunch - and I was thoroughly...More

review_data.title: Great for coffee & lunch
review_data.content: Great for a time out/change from the normal. Menu is extensive enough, food always fresh and well done. Drinks are great, good coffee too. Great service and always accommodating. Also great that I can go with my dog. Thank you

review_data.title: É um bom restaurante.

review_data.title: My favorite lunch place in Zurich

review_data.title: Exists better options in Zurich
review_data.content: I have ordered a club sandwich when I went to Grieder Bar. Nice environment, but very price. Just to give an idea, I have most probably paid for a club sandwich + coke + 10% service= around 50CHF Very good location

review_data.title: Excellent outdoor terrace.

review_data.title: Little getaway at the Bahnhofstrasse
review_data.content: It's a little restaurant with terrace in the summer in the Grieder shopping mall. It's a wonderful little place and perfect to escape the hectic for some time over lunch. They have standard dishes like salad, pasta etc. and have dailies on the board. It...More

review_data.title: Wonderful retreat at Bahnhofstrasse
review_data.content: If you are tyred of shopping, and sightseeing, have a break at the Griederbar, a wonderful place at Paradeplatz. We loved the cake and a glass of Prosecco with it. The Restaurant inside is quite small, but when you can get outside on sunny days,...More

review_data.title: Chic Cafe overlooking Zurich's Bahnhofstrasse
review_data.content: The Griederbar is still a favourite place to meet friends for cafe, lunch or apero. The trendy terrace on top of the Grieder department store has a beautiful garden. It serves refreshing drinks, great salads and small meals. A perfect stop when shopping the Bahnhofstrasse.
